IN THE DEVELOPMENT OF THIS LARGE DENOMINATIONAL SALES PROGRAM 

254 

ELLEN WHITE'S COUNSELS PLAYED A MAJOR ROLE. THROUGH HER REPEATED WRITTEN AND ORAL TESTIMONIES SHE CALLED FOR RECRUITS FROM AMONG THE BEST MEN AND WOMEN AND YOUTH OF THE CHURCH, INTELLIGENT, GOD-FEARING, TRUTH-LOVING, BUT NOT FROM AMONG THE FLOATING ELEMENT WHO HAD NEVER SUCCEEDED IN DOING ANYTHING ELSE. OFTEN MEN AND WOMEN OF PLEASING ADDRESS AND NEWLY CONVERTED TO GOD CAN BE ENLISTED FOR SERVICE IN THE ARMY OF LITERATURE EVANGELISTS.
